Class UserAccessManager

java.lang.Object
UserAccessManager
public class UserAccessManager extends Object
Manager class that provides methods for managing users.

      private static final boolean isLocked
      Comparison variable. To be used for comparison readability
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • Accounts

      private List<UserAccount> Accounts
      List of accounts.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserAccessManager

      public UserAccessManager()
      Initializes Accounts list with an array list

  • Method Details

    • loadAccounts

      public void loadAccounts(String filename) throws FileNotFoundException
      This method loads all user accounts from a .txt file.
      Parameters:
      filename - file to be opened
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - exception thrown if file is not found

    • addUser

      public void addUser(String username, String encryptedPassword) throws DuplicateUserException, InvalidCommandException
      This method adds users to the the UserAccessManager Accounts list. It assumes the users are already sorted.
      Parameters:
      username - user to be added
      encryptedPassword - encrpyt password before adding
      Throws:
      DuplicateUserException - thrown if there is a duplicate user
      InvalidCommandException - thrown if username or encrypted password is null/empty

    • removeUser

      public void removeUser(String username) throws UserNotFoundException, InvalidCommandException
      This removes a given user from the UserAccessManager Accounts list.
      Parameters:
      username - user to be removed
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - thrown if there is a user not found
      InvalidCommandException - thrown if username or encrypted password is null/empty

    • verifyAccess

      public boolean verifyAccess(String username, String encryptedPassword) throws InvalidCommandException, UserNotFoundException, AccountLockedException, PasswordIncorrectException
      Checks if a given password and username is valid in the Accounts list.
      Parameters:
      username - user to be verified
      encryptedPassword - password encrypted by Utilities method
      Returns:
      returns the access status of the user.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException
      AccountLockedException
      InvalidCommandException
      PasswordIncorrectException

    • linearSearch

      public int linearSearch(String username)
      Checks for existence of a user in the Accounts list. Returns -1 if user doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      username - user to be searched
      Returns:
      index of user in Accounts list.
